import { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import { Link, NavLink, useLocation } from 'react-router-dom' import styles from './Nav.module.scss' import { useAuth } from '../../context/AuthContext'; const Nav = () => { const location = useLocation() const {user} = useAuth() if (location.pathname === '/CriarConta' || location.pathname === '/Entrar' || location.pathname === '/Entrar'){ return null } return (
Home
    {user ? ( <>
  • (isActive ? styles.active : '')}> Perfil
    • ) : ( <>
  • (isActive ? styles.active : "")}> Criar Conta
  • (isActive ? styles.active : "")}> Entrar
    • )}
  • (isActive ? styles.active : "")} >About
); }; export default Nav;
